sections.heading: district; elections; procedure
sections.text: The elections provided for in sections 14-2102, 14-2120, 14-2142, and 14-2157 shall be held according to the Election Act.SourceLaws 1913, c. 143, § 19, p. 360;R.S.1913, § 4261;C.S.1922, § 3764;C.S.1929, § 14-1020;R.S.1943, § 14-1030;R.S.1943, (1991), § 14-1030;Laws 19

14-2152.Utilities district; elections; procedure.

The elections provided for in sections 14-2102, 14-2120, 14-2142, and 14-2157 shall be held according to the Election Act.

SourceLaws 1913, c. 143, § 19, p. 360;R.S.1913, § 4261;C.S.1922, § 3764;C.S.1929, § 14-1020;R.S.1943, § 14-1030;R.S.1943, (1991), § 14-1030;Laws 1992, LB 746, § 52;Laws 1994, LB 76, § 479.

Cross ReferencesElection Act, see section 32-101.
